inclusion.criterion: Age 10-25 years at time of enrollment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of hypothalamic obesity with age- and sex adjusted BMI ≥ 95% or BMI ≥30
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: History of craniopharyngioma or another tumor located in the hypothalamic area
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Weight stable or increasing over 3 months prior to screening visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stable hormone replacement for at least 3 months prior to screening visit
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal impairment (GFR<60 ml/min/1.73m² using the Schwarz formula)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of gastroparesis; pancreatitis or gallstones (unless status post cholecystectomy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Family history of multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2 or familial medullary thyroid carcinoma metabolic disorders
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any insulin-treated diabetes mellitus, poorly controlled type 2 diabetes (HbA1c ≥ 10%), or any other chronic serious medical conditions such as cardiovascular disease, malignancy or hematologic disorder, complicated syndromic disorder, or psychiatric disorders
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Initiation of weight loss medications within 3 months of screening visit
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous donation of blood >10% of estimated blood volume within 3 months prior study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of schizophrenia, which is a chronic serious medical condition. They also have a history of cardiovascular disease (CHF) and malignancy (COPD). These conditions make them likely ineligible for the study.
